1. Add Friends : Find your colleague doctors and add them to your friend List
 2. Add Group : Create group from doctors in your friend list
 3. Add Patient: (Plus icon on home page) Add patients to your groups
 4. Add Data : (By clicking on patient name on home page)Add the obserations of patients that are added in you groups

The basic use of this app is that you can monitor the patient observations while you are away.\n Groups helps you in a way that only some doctors can monitor/add observations/add Data of the patient.\n
To begin, get started by adding your colleagues to your friend list
Create specialized groups to monitor the patients together
